2019.title: DEE2
2019.description: DEE2 makes large scale gene expression data sets accessible to bioinformaticians, biologists and students alike.

2019.title: NCBoost
2019.description: NCBoost classifies pathogenic non-coding variants in Mendelian diseases through supervised learning on purifying selection signals in humans.

2019.title: Genomic GPS
2019.description: Genomic GPS allows sharing of information to a degree sufficient for approximating relative genetic distance of an individual from either another individual or a group.

2019.title: OmicsSIMLA
2019.description: OmicsSIMLA is a simulation tool for generating multi-omics data with disease status.

2019.title: Protein Repeatability Scanner
2019.description: The RES tool allows to detect the repeatability of an input sequence.
